Day 6: JavaScript Challenge

6 June 2017 written by Muhammad D. Ramadhan

I was using fetch method which really shows me the Promise and its early usage for AJAX programming. Here’s one of the most cutest girl in China.

I had nothing to say about this challenge. Here’s the demo and the repo. Please, read the gist while fixing your eyes on that beautiful girl above!

Firstly, I copied the boilerplate and tinkered with the UI for a bit. I intended to make it look more like Reddit with its calming light blue. I ditched all the CSS transition and went on with boring design which I really love the most.

I like this challenge.
